title: Chief Operating Officer (COO) – AI Tech Company
job_overview:
About the Role:
An ambitious AI tech company is looking for a highly capable COO to run day-to-day operations and help us scale. You’ll manage cross-functional teams, ensure systems run efficiently, and take ownership of projects involving large data pipelines and AI agent development.

What You’ll Do:

Oversee internal operations, timelines, and execution across departments

Manage and optimize large data workflows for training and deployment

Coordinate the creation and refinement of AI agents with internal teams

Build and maintain operational systems that scale with the business

Act as the founder’s right hand—solving problems before they hit his desk

Lead and communicate with remote teams across global time zones

What We’re Looking For:

Proven operational leadership in a tech or startup environment

Strong experience with data management, pipelines, and process automation

High attention to detail and ability to execute at speed

Excellent written and verbal English communication

Bonus: Experience with LLMs, AI tools, or no-code/low-code agent creation

Location: Remote (Philippines only)
Type: Full-time
Start Date: ASAP

To apply, message your resume and a link to a short video explaining why you’re the one! (google drive link is fine)
